text: José Carlos da Silva José (22 September 1941 - 26 April 2025), known as José Carlos, was a Portuguese footballer who played mostly as a central defender. José Carlos died on 26 April 2025 at the age of 83 .Morreu José Carlos: Magriço e vencedor da Taça das Taças deixa Sporting e futebol português de luto ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Portuguese footballers
title: José Carlos da Silva José
